analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#277-285) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#282-285)

ClinicAllRefundEscrow.deposits (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#312-315) shadows:
	- Escrow.deposits (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#165)

ClinicAllRefundEscrow.withdrawChunk has external calls inside a loop:
	- _refundee.transfer(_paymentWithoutTxFee) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#465-466)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x0c5c553a0795db4b5e305ccf6c57fe885aadc0be.sol#68-73) should be declared external
